Name: Poison Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Ground-type moves from damaging Poison-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Poison-type Pokémon.  You can get a Poison Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Pink Silk, a Poison Dust, and a Poison Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
